component.text: SPAN port sending copies of traffic

component.feedback: ***You must enter the exact and full command. Commands that include a name or password are case-sensitive.***
component.existingcommands:
Enter global configuration mode and then configure the following:
  • Issue the SPAN command to monitor the traffic on source port F0/1. Use 1 for the session number.
  • Capture the session 1 monitored traffic on destination port F0/2.
  • Exit global configuration mode.

command.deviceresponse: Enter configuration commands, one per line. End with CNTL/Z.

S1#
*Mar 1 00:19:53.908: %SYS-5-CONFIG_I: Configured from console by console
S1#
command.instruction: <font face="_sans"><b>Verify that SPAN has been configured to monitor source port F0/1 with captured traffic being sent to F0/2.</font>

command.deviceresponse:
Session 1
---------
Type : Local Session
Source Ports :
Both : Fa0/1
Destination Ports : Fa0/2
Encapsulation : Native
Ingress : Disabled


S1#
command.instruction: <font face="_sans"><b>You have successfully configured and verified SPAN.</font>
